placeholders.pulses: Here you'll find all the pulses you created or participate in.

placeholders.shortDescription: One paragraph, but a very good one!
placeholders.description: Tell us more about your Pulse
placeholders.event: To find people for your event: events, product announcements, etc.
placeholders.project: To find people for your project: teams for competitions, startups, etc.
placeholders.images: One photo is required. We recommend uploading at least 3 photos.
placeholders.avatar: The first photo in the list will be the pulse avatar.

aboutApp.title: About the App, Help
aboutApp.aboutApp: The "Together" app was created so that you can find like-minded people and implement your coolest ideas.
aboutApp.aboutCommunity: The app is being developed by the community of the same name. You can find more about us in
aboutApp.vkGroup: the official VK group of the application.

pulsePreview.placeholder: Tell us about yourself and your motivation to join the pulse

app.title: Networking Platform
app.subtitle: A platform for finding like-minded people and creating your dream team.

pulse.title: Pulse
pulse.subtitle: This is an activity where you're looking for like-minded people, for example, a project or an event.

lenta.title: Feed
lenta.subtitle: The recommendation system will select the most interesting pulses for you.
